Reverse image search: The expert performed a reverse image search on Google and found that the viral images are not recent. They are from 2017.
Image verification: The expert found that the image on the top right was published by Hindustan Times in October 2017. According to the article, the traffic signs were vandalized by various organizations after they alleged that the Punjabi language was "disrespected" by placing it at the bottom of traffic signboards.
Video verification: The expert performed a reverse image search using InVid, a video verification tool, and found that a video related to the claim was published by Tamil language news outlet Sathiyam News last year in September.
